ModMetaData.name: Cannons and Turrets
ModMetaData.author: PunisheR007
ModMetaData.description:
Version:- 3.81
Artillery, howitzer and flak cannons, and a multiple rocket launcher. Howitzer fires shells straight and the artillery, flak and mrl over walls, mountains and rock.
3 Types of blasting charges. (incendiary, emp and stun)
Plus Kilroys killer turrets pack.
and more.
